phrases: Why did you let her climb up?
But, there was no time to stop her!
It is too cramped inside that house.
But our house is so big...
Will you play tennis with me again?
Emma... as in, the girl that brother Will was talking about?
I believe he will return soon.
There is someone here to see him.
Pardon me, but are you here to see Master William?
If you would, please come in.
I have been asked to tell you to wait inside.
Why was she shown to the guest room?
I think she is rather plain.
It is a shame about Mrs. Stownar.
If I had known about it, I would have attended the funeral.
He did not know, did he...
I never know what he is thinking!
Did not you have something to tell William?
I just... wanted to say goodbye.
I am going back to the village where I was born.
It is a small town by the sea.
Though, it might not be there anymore.
I can no longer stay at her home.
I will not be coming back.
You love William and William loves you, right?
So why would you run to some far-off place on your own?
It is not as though we forgot about you...
But we did forget about him.
I wonder what Prince Hakim could possibly have to say to her?
It looks like brother Will still has not given up, in spite of what father said.
It is none of our affair.
I am sure our brother knows what he is doing.
She must be a fortune hunter.
This whole maid business is too strange!
Do not say such ridiculous things!
Where did you learn such a word?
To fall into her trap like that!
I am going to give her a piece of my mind!
How dare she come to the house!
I do not know what your intentions are, but you should just give up and go home!
Brother Will's stupidity is one thing, but you do not have any common sense either!
How do you not understand something so simple-
It seems we have an unexpected guest.
She is an acquaintance of Master William's.
Prince Hakim is entertaining her at the moment.
You do not approve of her either!
You should not shout like that.
You never know who is listening!
What is more, we have only just been accepted by the gentry.
If rumor gets out that our brother is courting a maid,
we will be the laughing stock of polite society.
None of you seem to realize the situation we are in!
Ah... why am I being scolded when she is the one at fault?
May I leave the table, please?
It would seem our daughter is lovesick.
It will be wonderful if the match with the Jones family goes through, will not it?
Do not make so much noise!
It is true, is not it...
I kept thinking that we lived in the same place.
You both live in the same England.
I realize that the worlds we live in... are completely different.
Now that I think about it, it is good that we did not meet today.
Now that I think about it, it is good that we did not meet today.
It is not good at all.
I gave you up because William loves you.
Do not decide this by yourself.
I have already made up my mind.
It must have been so lonely...
I have done nothing to be ashamed of.
It is you who should be ashamed, father.
I will make certain you are well paid.
How could you say such a thing?
